content: last stitch on the right-hand needle knit this stitch through the back loop 1 stitch increased make 1 right m1r insert left-hand needle from back to front under the yarn running from the first stitch on the left- hand needle and the last stitch on the right-hand needle knit this stitch 1 stitch increased purl wrapped stitch on wrong side slip 1 purlwise from left-hand needle to the right-hand needle with the tip of the left-hand needle pick up the wrap around the slipped stitched slip 1 purlwise from right-hand needle back onto left- hand needle purl stitch and wrap together purl double-wrapped stitch on right side with the tip of the right-hand needle pick up the two wraps around the slipped stitched and slip them onto the left-hand needle purl the two wraps and stitch together purl double-wrapped stitch on wrong side slip 1 purlwise from left-hand needle to the right-hand needle with the tip of the left-hand needle pick up the two wraps around the slipped stitched slip 1 purlwise from right-hand needle back onto left-hand needle purl stitch and two wraps together wrap and turn on right side row bring yarn to front slip 1 purlwise from left-hand needle to the right-hand needle bring yarn to back slip 1 purlwise from right-hand needle back onto left-hand needle turn work wrap and turn on wrong side row bring yarn to back slip 1 purlwise from left-hand needle to the right-hand needle bring yarn to front slip 1 purlwise from right-hand needle back onto left-hand needle turn work helpful tutorials judy s magic cast on see this excellent tutorial in knitty for help http //www knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html elizabeth zimmerman s sewn bind off see this other excellent tutorial in knitty for help http //www knitty com/issuesummer06/featsum06tt html follow @newenglandknitting on instagram for pattern releases and share your projects with #newenglandknitting visit heather s yarn barn on etsy at https //www etsy com/shop/heathersyarnbarn
